Title: Halter Beaded Top Backless Gown with Train

Category: evening, formal-gowns

Featured-image: KD012-champagne-halter-beaded-top-backless-gown-with-train_p.jpg

----

Description: This sexy gown gives the appearance of a completely sheer bodice. Transparent chiffon covers the nude lining creating a sweetheart neckline with a halter top overlay. The bodice is covered in intricately embellished beadwork that cascades into the floor length skirt. The open back adds to the sexiness of this gown.
